participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and dedicated, he enjoys working on projects that challenge his skills and appreciates a quiet life.
participant_1.background: I thought of joining the military when I was younger. I was a mechanic for 6 years. I ran for political office in 2004. I build my own computers.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and driven, she cares deeply about social issues and wants to create positive change through technology.
participant_2.background: I like to work out at the gym to Christian electronic dance music. People hate that I obsess about the poor. I like to watch people pray together. I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world. People donâ€™t like me too much but I like them anyways.

content.text: I'm a bit of a loner, but I love to build computers. Do you ever build computers?
I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
That's really cool! I love making things that help people.
I'm glad you like it. I think it's important to make the world a better place.
I agree. I think it's important to make a difference in the world.
Me too. I think it's something we all should strive for.
I like your attitude. It's refreshing to meet someone who is so passionate about helping others.
Thank you. I'm glad you like it. I think it's important to be passionate about something.
I agree. I think it's what makes life worth living.
I agree. Life is too short to not be passionate about something.
I'm glad we agree. It's nice to meet someone who shares my values.
Me too. It's always nice to meet like-minded people.
